abstract: Documents obtained by Bloomberg News in an antitrust case against a group of Wall Street firms named JPMorgan Chase, Lehman Brothers and UBS as conspiring to pay unfairly low rates on investments made by state and local governments.
snippet: Documents obtained by Bloomberg News in an antitrust case against a group of Wall Street firms named JPMorgan Chase, Lehman Brothers and UBS as conspiring to pay unfairly low rates on investments made by state and local governments.
lead_paragraph: Documents obtained by Bloomberg News in an antitrust case against a group of Wall Street firms named JPMorgan Chase, Lehman Brothers and UBS as conspiring to pay unfairly low rates on investments made by state and local governments.

headline.main: Big Banks Said to Be Named in Municipal Bond Case
